description:
After defeating Haryu and his men, Daiki, Jin, Ryuzaki and Shinjo go down to Black Crusader`s evil lair. Waiting for them there were BC`s eerie looking top members, Fukuo, Taira and their boss, Nodo.
BC`s top guys attack Daiki and his friends in vicious ways. Daiki and his team get back footed in BC`s home park and separated. Does Daiki`s fair fight beat up these basehearted BC bosses?
Source: crunchyroll
